meanings.definition: A flowing or pouring in; influx.
meanings.sent1: The inpouring of students into the school during the morning rush was chaotic.
meanings.sent2: The inpouring of donations after the charity event was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The inpouring of puppies at the animal shelter made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The inpouring of sunlight through the window brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The inpouring of rain during the storm caused flooding in the streets.

meanings.sent1: The inpouring of customers into the store during the sale was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The inpouring of messages on her phone after the announcement was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The inpouring of laughter from the comedy show echoed through the theater.
meanings.sent4: The inpouring of emotions during the heartfelt speech moved everyone to tears.
meanings.sent5: The inpouring of memories flooded her mind when she visited her childhood home.
